text: Ankaux prohibited est women jam married ili flee their disbelieving husbands est je milit vi. These est di commandments vi. All ali categories permes vi marriage long as vi pag them their due dowries. Vi argument your morality per ne committing adultery! Tiel whoever vi like them vi pag them dowry dekret por them. Vi ne commit error per mutually agreeing al any adjustments al dowry! DI est Omniscient SAGX
